name: SparX the Robot
description:
A demo of a 3D platformer with cartoon style visuals and a colourful environment. The finished game will include combating enemies, boss battles, the collecting of different items, exploring an environment filled with interesting characters and fun challenges.

In the demo you can explore a sectioned off area of the city, which will act as a hub to transport you to different worlds in the final game. The area in the demo contains 100 nuts & bolts to find, as well as a golden cog.

This game was developed as part of an university assignment.

The game uses the Jammo character, created by Mix and Jam.
